resources.string: In the year 2180, when humanity is at its peak in terms of technology and prosperity, a group of scientists develop a promising technology that would allow contact with all forms of intelligent life no matter where they are in the universe. A few months later they receive signals from an alien galaxy that seems to be coming from an unknown galaxy. This is a huge breakthrough for humanity as they discover that they are not the only life form. In 2183 objects that appear to be spaceships head for Earth and their arrival is scheduled for 2184. Humanity prepares to welcome its new guests with peace and diplomacy, unaware that the latter have hostile intentions and covet our planet. When they arrive, the aliens decimate everything in their path, but fortunately some brave soldiers are ready to do anything to save humanity. You are one of these brave soldiers, the fate of humanity is in your hands.)
